DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy safety ABT-894 ( 1mg , 2mg 4mg capsule ) administer BID placebo treatment DNP . Another treatment arm Duloxetine 60mg administer daily ( QD ) . Approximately 275 subject enrol study approximately 50 site United States Europe . The study divide follow period : Screening/Washout ( 21 day ) follow Baseline Visit , 8-week Treatment Period 1-week Follow-up Visit .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Subjects With Diabetic Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: If female , subject either postmenopausal least two ( 2 ) year surgically sterile practice least one ( 1 ) method birth control . If female , subject must negative result pregnancy test . The subject must diagnosis diabetes mellitus ( Type 1 Type 2 ) diagnosis DNP . Subject 's DNP must present minimum six ( 6 ) month begin foot relative symmetrical onset . Subject HgbA1c < = 9 . Subjects HgbA1c > 9 < = 11 may include study . If male , subject surgically sterile ( vasectomy ) , sexually inactive , use barrier method ( condom ) birth control duration study 7 day follow last dose study drug . The subject fail previous treatment duloxetine DNP . Subject diagnosis narrowangle glaucoma . Subject history allergic reaction intolerance duloxetine , acetaminophen , NNR agonist . Subject diagnosis fibromyalgia require treatment . Subject functioning implant medical device ( spinal cord stimulator , intrathecal pump peripheral nerve stimulator ) treatment neuropathic pain . Subject history seizure ( febrile may ok ) major depressive episode within past two ( 2 ) year major psychiatric disorder include bipolar disorder , schizophrenia borderline personality disorder . Subject history myocardial infarction ( MI ) within six ( 6 ) month Screening Visit . Subject unstable angina . Subject ventricular arrhythmia require antiarrhythmic therapy . Subject undergone cardiac revascularization procedure within 30 day Screening . Subject uncontrolled hypertension ( HTN ) define systolic blood pressure ( BP ) > = 160 and/or diastolic blood pressure ( BP ) > = 100 Screening and/or Baseline . Subject clinically significant abnormal ECG Screening Subject active malignancy type diagnose treated cancer within past 5 year . Subject positive result drug abuse Screening exception positive result know prescribed medication . Subject 's screen laboratory result show hepatitis A , B C. Subject know suspect history Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) .
